PERSONA:
meet robert, a 68-year-old widowed man living in a non-metropolitan area of the west north central region of the midwest. a high school graduate with no further formal education, robert comes from a white non-hispanic background and was born in the united states.

despite being financially constrained with an annual income below $30,000, robert is an avid internet user, accessing it several times a day. he identifies as a conservative republican and is a registered voter who aligns with the party's ideology. however, his religious beliefs lean towards agnosticism, and he never attends religious services, being part of the unaffiliated group.

robert's life experiences have shaped his worldview, and he carries traditional values and beliefs. while he may face challenges associated with his age and income level, he remains engaged with current affairs and exercises his civic duty by participating in elections. his persona reflects the complexities of individuals within specific demographic groups, defying simplistic stereotypes.
